title: JSON schema for the Bebop compiler's configuration file

inputFiles.description: Specifies a list of schemas that will be included for compilation.

inputDirectory.description: Specifies a directory containing Bebop schemas that will be included for compilation.

compilerOptions.description: Instructs the Bebop compiler how to compile .bop files.

exclude.description: Specifies a list of schemas to be excluded from compilation. The 'exclude' property only affects the files included via the 'inputDirectory' property and not the 'inputFiles' property.

noEmit.description: Disable emitting files from a compilation.

namespace.description: Specifies a namespace that generated code will use.

generators.description: Specifies a list of code generators to target during compilation.

alias.description: Specify the code generator schemas will be compiled to.

outputFile.description: Specify a file that bundles all generated code into one file.

langVersion.description: Specify the version of the language the code generator should target.

disableGenerationNotice.description: Specify if the code generator should produces a notice at the start of the output file stating code was auto-generated.
